document_data.mainbody:
Phelos Mistarn was a priest of Shaundakul, the Rider of the Winds, during the mid-to-late 14 century DR.
He was an old man with a grim attitude.
Phelos lived in Hillsfar in Moonsea region. He was one of only a handful of known priests of Shaundakul following the end of the Time of Troubles in the .
